Frequently Asked Questions

What is Megusta?

Megusta is a decentralized gaming platform offering Play-to-Earn tournaments with real rewards. We bridge the gap between traditional gaming and the exciting world of Web3, bringing you a unique and rewarding experience.

How does it work?

You can participate in tournaments, win Gusta points, and redeem them for native chain tokens or in-game assets. Learn more in the "How It Works" section.

What games are available?

We offer a variety of hypercasual and casual games, including arcade, puzzle, and strategy games. New games are added regularly.

Which chains are supported?

Currently, we are focusing on the EVM based chains. We support Ethereum, Lisk, Mantle, Flare, and Gravity. We will be adding Supra and Metis in the next phase.

Which wallet are supported?

We currently support Metamask only since we're in the beta phase. We will add more as we get closer to the official launch. Also, please note that you might have to disable the Starkey wallet extension on Chrome for Megusta to work properly, since it can interfere with the Metamask trigger.

Is it safe to use?

We prioritize security and utilize robust blockchain technology to ensure the safety of your assets.

How can I get started?

Simply connect your Metamask and start playing. ETH is set as the default chain and currently you don't need tokens to play.
